543670.name: Fantasy Grounds - D&D Map Pack Volume 1
543670.description:
D&D Map Pack Volume 1
D&D Map Pack Volume 1 contains 14 maps usable in any fantasy game. Pulled from Wizards of the Coasts' extensive art libraries, this collection features maps for each of the following locations:
  • Basement Study
  • Castle Wall
  • Cave Lair
  • Crossroads
  • Farmstead
  • Forest Lair
  • Monster Lair
  • Snow Village
  • Swamp Lair
  • Tavern
  • Underground Complex
  • Wagon Trail and Shrine
  • Waterfall Cavern
Each map has been optimized for online play and preset with a 50 pixel square grid. Just add your players and NPCs to your combat tracker, drop on the map and go.
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and the included 5e ruleset.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and the included D&D fifth edition ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
